Title of your event: Mass DeFi: onboarding the next billion users
Short description of your event: A discussion on how we make DeFi more accessible to everyone: from degens to normies.
Long description of your event: DeFi is still overwhelming for most people, degens and whales included. So much time spent keeping track of investments and returns, looking for alpha and avoiding rug pulls. During this event we will look at what tools already exist that make DeFi easier, how we improve them, and what else we need to buidl.
Speaker(s): Raphaël Mazet (SimpleFi), Ivailo Jordanov (7Percent) others TBD

Short description of your event: Blockchain Sunsets at The Block plus 50% of discount at The Block coworking desks
Long description of your event: The Block is organizing a series of events during the whole Blockchain Week

Short description of your event: start with a panel between two very different worlds and end with a toast to a new alliance
Long description of your event: Stake DAO, Stake Capital, Sygnum and others (to be announced soon) will close the lisbon ethereum conference with a panel -How should DeFi and CeFi build the future of finance together or sign up for a no-win fight?  After that, it will be time to debrief this great conference around a drink and plan to meet again for the next events.
Sponsor(s): Stake DAO, Stake Capital, Sygnum Bank

Short description of your event: Panel on scaling DeFi from a niche market for degens and whales to a mass market that benefits everyone
Long description of your event: DeFi is growing exponentially and has the potential to give financial freedom to billions of people. But it's also completely overwhelming, even for degens: too much complexity, too many interfaces, too many risks. Join our panel for an open discussion on how we design new tools and systems to make DeFi more accessible, so people spend less time trying to figure out how and what to invest in, and more time reaping the benefits of DeFi.
Speaker(s): Speakers from SimpleFi, StakeDAO, Celo and more.

Short description of your event: brunch to rewards winners of the treasure hunt of Blackpool on OVR
Long description of your event:
The day after the Ethliscon closing party we propose a brunch to recover from the previous day's excesses. But the game will have started long before... Let's gamify the brunch

A scavenger hunt on OVR, starting at the beginning of the conference and ending on the day of the brunch. The winners will be invited to the brunch in order to make a competition where they also give away tickets for the brunch.

Short description of your event: Panel regarding real world  asset and the link with NFT/Blockchain
Long description of your event: This panel is to discuss the topic of the interaction between NFT and physical assets. Different project will take the mic to expose their position and what they are building by their side to design the futur of propriety on the blockchain.

Short description of your event: Reunited in Lisbon mains actors of NFT industry will propose a special moment for you to bet and buy exclusives NFT
Long description of your event: Auction during in person or online during the whole night. Each NFT is presented by a manager. Part of the benefits will be donate to a caritative organisation chosen by each sponsors. The
Speaker(s): Blackpool , RealT, Stake DAO , Centrifuge and more
Sponsor(s): Blackpool , RealT, Stake DAO , Centrifuge and more

Short description of your event: To celebrate the world of possible around Non Fongible Assets we propose to cheers together
Long description of your event: Degen, newbies, curious you're all welcome to this exceptional non-fongible moment with DJ, drink , finger food and amazing people overall. Some details to be announce very soon ..
Speaker(s): Stake DAO , Centrifuge , RealT , Blackpool & more
Sponsor(s): Stake DAO , Centrifuge , RealT , Blackpool & more

Short description of your event: Free accommodation in a big house in Marvila
Long description of your event: Encode Club has booked a house where any hacker or ETH Lisbon attendee can stay with us free of charge. Just email anthony@encode.club if you're interested.

Short description of your event: a meetup and a dance party
Long description of your event: We are thinking of throwing a proper underground house/techno party for everyone to enjoy themselves and get loose.

Short description of your event: A decentralised soirée for DAOs and those who want to learn about governance.
Long description of your event: DAOs are eating the world, and decentralised governance solutions are accelerating the pace at which Web3's premise can be fulfilled. Join us at DAOTown, the best in-person crypto party in Lisbon on Wednesday the 20th of October, as we bring dGov enthusiasts of all walks of life together under one roof to celebrate the advancement of DAOs.

Short description of your event: The place to talk shop for DAOists
2-days conference for builders, thinkers and creators across the space
Long description of your event:
LisCon is a celebration of our culture and values, a coming together of builders, thinkers and creators across the space.

LisCon is the perfect opportunity to:
- Be together in a beautiful location
- Celebrate Web3 culture & community
- Share latest project updates, educate newcomers, engage the community
Address: R. Rodrigues de Faria 103, 1300-501 Lisboa, Portugal

Short description of your event: The place for BUIDLers and innovators
Long description of your event: EthLisbon is the most anticipated hackathon event in recent times, and the one that originated the Lisbon Blokchain Week in the first place. Join us for 3 days of non-stop BUIDLing and innovation!
Sponsor(s): Lightshift Capital, 1kx, Department of Decentralization, The Block, Portugal Fintech, Fintech House
